tasks.build: pip install -r requirements.txt && python setup.py build_ext --inplace
tasks.launch: python -c "from wdbx import WDBX; from wdbx.api import WDBXAPIServer; import asyncio; async def main(): wdbx = WDBX(vector_dimension=384, enable_plugins=True); await wdbx.initialize(); server = WDBXAPIServer(wdbx, port=8000); await server.initialize(); await server.start(); asyncio.run(main())"
